body: Unfortunately, I couldn't reproduce the problem. How did you import the .aar file from your android studio? If you import it using the default .aar file import option from Android Studio, it actually copies the .aar file into the module directory. Either you have to copy the output of gomobile to the module directory, or specify output directory to point to the module directory or use the plugin in https://plugins.gradle.org/plugin/org.golang.mobile.bind (warning: it's beta)
